author: William Hall
book_summary: A scientist discovers a way to access alternate dimensions, only to realize the consequences are far more dangerous than anticipated.
author_message: The future is not set in stone. Every choice we make leads to another unknown world.
book_comments: An incredible mind-bending adventure that keeps you on the edge of your seat.
